post.text: THANK YOU to my unbelievable family- for their incredible support of my candidacy-- love you all!

comment.author: Wyatt
comment.text: I've attended Donald Trump's rally at the Convention Center in San Diego. It was awesome to feel the positive energy of the room & the Trump train steams on. Next stop; the WHITE HOUSE! #CALIFORNIANSFORTRUMP2016 #HISPANICS/#LATINOSFORDONALDJTRUMP2016 #NEVERHILLARY #VeterransforTrump

replies.author: William
replies.text: Wouldn't it be great if the media showed the good side of what goes on. ðŸ˜Š

replies.author: Wyatt
replies.text: William; the political media is in cahoos with the Clintons!!

replies.author: William
replies.text: Yes, they are Wyatt. More than that they have been not been true journalists for at least 50 years, but propagandizing and lying to the public all along. Since in the later years they have become so brazen people in America are finally realizing this, where before only a few of us understood what they were doing.
